item.description:
Bay State Parent magazine hooked us up with a bunch of free passes for a special advanced screening of The Help on Wednesday 7/13.  We've got more tickets than our members can use, so if you're able to join us, we'd love to share them with you!  

Here's the movie trailer, for anyone who hasn't seen it:  http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=J_ajv_6pUnI

Please RSVP so we know to look for you, and can make sure we have enough passes for everyone.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet ~6:45 in the ticket lobby... we'll be holding a bunch of bright pink passes!
item.name: FREE Movie Screening: The Help
